        public void saveImage(java.io.File f,
             java.awt.image.BufferedImage bImage)
        saves the Image to the file. Closing the program before saving the whole file will end up in a only partially painted image.
        Parameters:

      • writeFile

        public void writeFile(java.io.File f,
             java.lang.String[] content)
        writes a file out of the content. Non existing files will be created, existing file will be overwritten ( without asking). Files without the defined extension are renamed to filename."'Extension'
        Parameters:
        f -
        content -
